annotations.title: Advanced Techniques - Pour Over Coffee Cocktails

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Cognac
1oz (30ml) banana liqueur
2 dashes chocolate bitters
Orange twist garnish
15 grams coffee

Add all liquid ingredients into a mixing glass with ice
Stir for 45 seconds
Pour over coffee through drip into a rocks glass with a large ice cube
Express orange oils over the top and garnish with the twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ryR4ajvQoY8
title: Banana Cognac
